verses.verse: That <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> as the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> in <S%H1697>regard<s%> to the drought: <S%H9060><s%>

<S%H3063>"Judah<s%> <S%H56>mourns,<s%> And her <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H535>languish;<s%> They <S%H6937>sit<s%> on the <S%H776>ground<s%> in <S%H6937>mourning,<s%> And the <S%H6682>cry<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> has <S%H5927>ascended.<s%>

"And their <S%H117>nobles<s%> have <S%H7971>sent<s%> their <S%H6810>servants<s%> for <S%H4325>water;<s%> They have <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H1356>cisterns<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%> They have <S%H7725>returned<s%> with their <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H7387>empty;<s%> They have <S%H954>been<s%> <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame<s%> and <S%H3637>humiliated,<s%> And they <S%H2645>cover<s%> their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>

<S%H5668>"Because<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> is <S%H2865>cracked,<s%> For there has <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> on the <S%H776>land;<s%> The <S%H406>farmers<s%> have <S%H954>been<s%> <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame,<s%> They have <S%H2645>covered<s%> their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>

"For <S%H1571>even<s%> the <S%H355>doe<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> has <S%H3205>given<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> only to <S%H5800>abandon<s%> [her young,] <S%H3588>Because<s%> there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1877>grass.<s%>

"And the <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>donkeys<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> on the <S%H8205>bare<s%> <S%H8205>heights;<s%> They <S%H7602>pant<s%> for <S%H7307>air<s%> like <S%H8565>jackals,<s%> Their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3615>fail<s%> For <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6212>vegetation.<s%>

<S%H518>"Although<s%> our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> <S%H6030>testify<s%> against us, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H6213>act<s%> for Thy name's <S%H4616>sake!<s%> <S%H3588>Truly<s%> our <S%H4878>apostasies<s%> have <S%H7231>been<s%> <S%H7231>many,<s%> We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against Thee.

"Thou <S%H4723>Hope<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Its <S%H3467>Savior<s%> in <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>distress,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H1961>art<s%> Thou like a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> Or like a <S%H732>traveler<s%> who has <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his [tent] for the <S%H3885>night<s%>?

<S%H4100>"Why<s%> <S%H1961>art<s%> Thou like a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1724>dismayed,<s%> Like a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>man<s%> who <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3467>save<s%>? Yet Thou art in our <S%H7130>midst,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And we are <S%H7121>called<s%> by Thy <S%H8034>name;<s%> Do not <S%H5117>forsake<s%> us!"

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> "Even <S%H3651>so<s%> they have <S%H157>loved<s%> to <S%H5128>wander;<s%> they have not <S%H2820>kept<s%> their <S%H7272>feet<s%> in <S%H2820>check.<s%> Therefore the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> does not <S%H7521>accept<s%> them; <S%H6258>now<s%> He will <S%H2142>remember<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and <S%H6485>call<s%> their <S%H9128>sins<s%> to <S%H6485>account.<s%>"
So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "Do not <S%H6419>pray<s%> for the <S%H9186>welfare<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> they <S%H6684>fast,<s%> I am not going to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to their <S%H7440>cry;<s%> and <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> I am not going to <S%H7521>accept<s%> them. <S%H3588>Rather<s%> I am going to <S%H3615>make<s%> an <S%H3615>end<s%> of them by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%> and <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>"

But, "Ah, <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God!<s%>" I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Look,<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> are <S%H559>telling<s%> them, 'You will not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> will you <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H7458>famine,<s%> but I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H571>lasting<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>'"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "The <S%H5030>prophets<s%> are <S%H5012>prophesying<s%> <S%H8267>falsehood<s%> in My <S%H8034>name.<s%> I have <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to them; they are <S%H5012>prophesying<s%> to you a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H2377>vision,<s%> <S%H7081>divination,<s%> <S%H457>futility<s%> and the <S%H9652>deception<s%> of their own <S%H3820>minds.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who are <S%H5012>prophesying<s%> in My <S%H8034>name,<s%> although it was not I who <S%H7971>sent<s%> them – yet they keep <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'There shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> or <S%H7458>famine<s%> in <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>' – by <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%> shall <S%H8552>meet<s%> their <S%H8552>end!<s%>

"The <S%H5971>people<s%> also to <S%H834>whom<s%> they are <S%H5012>prophesying<s%> will be <S%H7993>thrown<s%> out into the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H7458>famine<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and <S%H369>there<s%> will be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> them – [neither] them, <S%H369>[nor<s%>] their <S%H802>wives,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> nor their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> – for I shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out their [own] <S%H9567>wickedness<s%> on them.

"And you will <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> to them, 'Let my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3381>flow<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H1832>tears<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3119>day,<s%> And let them not <S%H1820>cease;<s%> For the <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> has been <S%H7665>crushed<s%> with a <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H4347>blow,<s%> With a <S%H3966>sorely<s%> <S%H2470>infected<s%> <S%H4347>wound.<s%>

<S%H518>'If<s%> I <S%H3318>go<s%> out to the <S%H7704>country,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> those <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword!<s%> Or <S%H518>if<s%> I <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H8463>diseases<s%> of <S%H7458>famine!<s%> For <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> and <S%H3548>priest<s%> Have gone <S%H5503>roving<s%> <S%H5503>about<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> that they do not <S%H3045>know.<s%>' "

Hast Thou <S%H3988>completely<s%> <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%>? <S%H518>Or<s%> hast Thou <S%H1602>loathed<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>? <S%H4069>Why<s%> hast Thou <S%H5221>stricken<s%> us so that we are <S%H369>beyond<s%> <S%H4832>healing<s%>? [We] <S%H6960>waited<s%> for <S%H7965>peace,<s%> but <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H9185>good<s%> [came;] And for a <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H4832>healing,<s%> but <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H1205>terror!<s%>
We <S%H3045>know<s%> our <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> The <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of our fathers, for we have <S%H1>sinned<s%> against Thee.

Do not <S%H5006>despise<s%> [us,] for Thine own name's <S%H4616>sake;<s%> Do not <S%H9310>disgrace<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of Thy <S%H9202>glory;<s%> <S%H2142>Remember<s%> [and] do not <S%H6565>annul<s%> Thy <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with us.

Are <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H3426>any<s%> among the <S%H1892>idols<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> who <S%H1652>give<s%> <S%H1652>rain<s%>? <S%H518>Or<s%> can the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H5414>grant<s%> <S%H7241>showers<s%>? Is it not Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>? Therefore we <S%H6960>hope<s%> in Thee, For Thou art the one who hast <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things.<s%>
